articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Hyesan City
articles.content:
Friendly Meeting Held at Chinese Embassy
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the work in various fields of Hyesan City, Ryanggang Province.
					 Kim Jong Il first went round the Victorious Battle of Pochonbo Memorial Tower standing at the foot of Koekungjong Hill in Hyesan.
					
					 After watching the group sculptures of the tower with the statue of President Kim Il Sung in the centre and the monument to his revolutionary exploits, he said that Kim Il Sung was an invincible and iron-willed commander, outstanding strategist and peerlessly great man, indeed. The exploits performed by Kim Il Sung for the liberation of the country will always be remembered by our people, he added.
					
					 He then provided field guidance to the Hyesan Steel Works.
					
					 After being briefed on the steel works before a huge map showing its panoramic view, he went round various production processes including the steel shop and the rolling shop. He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the workers of the works put the production on a high level by firmly establishing the steel production system of Korean style by their own efforts and with their own technology under the hard conditions where everything was in short supply.
					
					 He set forth tasks to be fulfilled by the works to develop it under a long-term plan. 
					
					 He then provided field guidance to the Hyesan Footwear Factory.
					
					 After walking round the room devoted to the history of the factory, he visited various shops including the cutting shop and the sewing shop to acquaint himself with its technological equipment and production there.
					
					 Seeing a variety of quality shoes produced by the technologically updated production processes, he said that it was very gratifying for the officials, workers and technicians of the factory to mass-produce a variety of quality winter shoes including cotton-padded high boots and supply them to people in the province. 
					
					 He set forth the tasks to be fulfilled by the factory.
					
					 He provided field guidance to the Kim Jong Suk University of Education.
					
					 He looked round the room devoted to the history of the university, conducted by its leading officials.
					
					 Saying that the graduates from the university have played a key role in the field of education, he expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the university has performed a vanguard role in the drive for developing the most advantageous educational system in the country by training many able teachers with strong revolutionary spirit and high qualifications. He highly appreciated the feats performed by the teachers and students of the university for the Party and the revolution, the country and its people. 
					
					 He then looked round various places of the university including the room for the study of the educational methods to learn in detail about how education is conducted. 
					
					 Watching all upbringing and educational facilities and campus kept in good order, he expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the university has trained its students as comprehensively qualified teachers after creating good environment for education. He highly estimated the feats performed by the teaching staff of the university. 
					
					 He advanced tasks to be fulfilled by the university. 
					
					 He met the educators of the university who rendered distinguished services for the country's development of education by devoting all their wisdom and energies to educating students for years and warmly encouraged them. He had a photograph taken with them. 
					
					 He toured Hyesan City, setting forth the tasks for its construction. 
					
					 It is of weighty importance for adding shine to the Party's glorious revolutionary traditions to spruce the city up well, the gateway to Mt. Paektu, he noted, specifying the orientation and ways to carry out the city construction under a long-term plan. 
					
					  He was accompanied by Kim Hi Thaek, chief secretary of the Ryanggang Provincial Committee of the WPK, Secretary Kim Ki Nam, Department Directors Kim Kyong Hui and Jang Song Thaek, First Vice Department Directors Ju Kyu Chang and Ri Je Gang of the WPK Central Committee, Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su, department directors of the NDC.

articles.title: DPRK SPA to Be Held
articles.content:
DPRK SPA  to Be Held
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- The Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly on Monday issued a decision on convening the SPA.
					 According to the decision, the 3rd Session of the 12th SPA will be convened in Pyongyang on June 7.

articles.title: Friendly Meeting Held at Chinese Embassy
articles.content:
Friendly Meeting Held at Chinese Embassy
Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, on Tuesday arranged a friendly meeting at his embassy to hail General Secretary Kim Jong Il's successful historic China visit.
					 Present there on invitation were Kim Yong Chun, vice-chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and minister of the People's Armed Forces, Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Yong Il and Kim Yang Gon, department directors of the C.C., the WPK, Jon Hui Jong, director of the Department for Foreign Affairs of the NDC of the DPRK, Kim Song Nam and Ri Yong Chol, vice department directors of the C.C., the WPK, and officials concerned. 
					
					 Staff members of the Chinese embassy were on hand.
					
					 Liu Hongcai in his speech made at the friendly meeting said that the recent China visit of General Secretary Kim Jong Il marked an important occasion in further developing the traditional friendly relations between the parties and peoples of the two countries and it would be brilliantly recorded in the history of the Sino-DPRK relations.
					
					 He noted that the party and the government of China will join the party and the government of the DPRK in making efforts to contribute to putting the bilateral relations on a new high stage, bringing wellbeing to the peoples of the two countries and achieving regional peace and common prosperity.
					
					 He expressed belief that the Korean people under the leadership of the WPK headed by Kim Jong Il would achieve greater successes in the building of a great prosperous and powerful nation. 
					
					 Choe Thae Bok in his speech referred to the fact that everything is going well and national power is growing stronger in China, and wished the Chinese people greater success in their future efforts.
					
					 Saying that it is the steadfast stand of the WPK and the DPRK government to consolidate and develop the DPRK-China friendship generation after generation, he stressed that the DPRK would make efforts to keep the flower garden of the bilateral friendship in fuller bloom together with the Chinese comrades in the future, too.
					
					 The participants in the meeting talked to one another about the need to boost the ties of friendship and cooperation between the two countries, deepening the friendship.

articles.title: Int'l Environment Workshop Held
articles.content:
Int'l Environment Workshop Held
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- An international environment workshop took place here from May 13 to 18.
					 Present there were officials of the Ministry of Land and Environmental Conservation, the Ministry of Agriculture, the State Science and Technology Commission, the Academy of Agricultural Science, the Pyongyang Horticulture Guidance Bureau, the Pyongyang International New Technological and Economic Information Centre, environmental and agricultural experts, the deputy director of the Environmental Education Media Project headquartered in China and environmental and agricultural experts of China, India and Canada. 
					
					 During the workshop speeches on environmental protection and prospect of organic farming in the DPRK were made to be followed by lectures on actual environmental improvement in different countries and achievements of new organic farming technologies. 
					
					 The participants watched a video on climate change.

articles.title: Ri Myon Sang, Celebrated Musician
articles.content:
Ri Myon Sang, Celebrated Musician
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- Ri Myon Sang (1908-1989), a laureate of the Kim Il Sung Prize and the title of People's Artist, is one of the renowned musicians who made a contribution to opening a heyday of the Juche-oriented culture and arts in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 He, who was born into a poor peasant family in Hamju County, South Hamgyong Province, and studied music under adversity, began composing songs before the liberation of the country, reflecting feelings of the Korean people and their sufferings from the Japanese colonial rule.
					
					 After the country's liberation (August 15, 1945) he created excellent works, including "The Glorious Motherland" (1947), "May, Month of Victory" (1947) and "Let's Go to Mountains and Seas" (1948), serving as a senior official in the musical and art field under the deep care of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					The songs, such as "Mungyong Pass" (1950), "The 2,000-ri Amnok River" (1952), "The Dear Home in My Native Village" (1952), "Oh, Motherly Party" (1964) and "The Snow Is Falling" (1965), created by him during the Fatherland Liberation War (from June 1950 to July 1953) and later, encouraged the Korean people, including the servicepersons, to do their best in the war and socialist construction.
					
					His fame was further enhanced in the 1970s when he devoted all his passion and wisdom to creating "The Sea of Blood"-style operas and other musical works conducive to the development of Juche-oriented music and arts under the guidance of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The songs in the opera "A Dream of Red Mansions" were created by him. The opera, created in Korea early in the 1960s on the basis of a Chinese novel and recreated last year, is being performed before full houses in China by the Phibada Opera Troupe of the DPRK.

articles.title: Spirit of Kwangju Uprising Still Alive in S. Korea
articles.content:
Spirit of Kwangju Uprising Still Alive in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- Thirty years has elapsed since a heroic popular uprising took place in Kwangju, south Korea.
					 Students and citizens of Kwangju rose up in an uprising for social independence and democracy and the country's reunification on May 18, Juche 69 (1980) after traitor Chun Doo Hwan declared "emergency martial law" in the whole land of south Korea to prop up the fascist dictatorship.
					
					 Chanting such slogans as "Lift the emergency martial law!", "Abolish the fascist system!" and "Yankees, go home!", they, armed with weapons they captured from troops, bravely fought against them to control the city for some ten days.
					
					 The uprising was brutally cracked down by the fascist clique manipulated by the U.S. imperialists, but the resistance spirit of the insurgents is still alive in south Korea.
					
					 Their wish has not yet been realized due to outsiders' domination over and interference in south Korea and the anti-national policies of the present south Korean rulers.
					
					 Some time ago the United States staged large-scale nuclear war exercises, Key Resolve and Foal Eagle, with the south Korean puppets to drive the situation of the Korean peninsula to the brink of war.
					
					 The south Korean conservative authorities have totally denied the June 15 joint declaration and October 4 declaration between the north and the south of Korea since they came to power. They have deteriorated the inter-Korean ties, blocked even civilian visits and cooperation and intensified the anti-north campaign and confrontation, aggravating the situation on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The fact gives a serious lesson that neither the independence and democracy of south Korean society nor the unity and reunification of the Korean nation can be achieved without driving the U.S. imperialists out of south Korea and thwarting the anti-reunification moves of the south Korean puppet regime.

articles.title: KCNA Rebukes Sophism of US Assistant Defense Secretary
articles.content:
KCNA Rebukes Sophism of US Assistant Defense Secretary
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- The U.S. assistant secretary of Defense for Asian and Pacific Affairs was recently reported to have let loose sheer nonsense.
					 He, expressing "concern" over the DPRK's nuclear development and China's efforts to bulk up military muscle, asserted the need for the long-term presence of the U.S. forces in East Asia and the establishment of the missile defense system there.
					
					 This is sheer sophism aimed to misrepresent the root cause of military tensions constantly running high in East Asia and carry out the U.S. strategy for military invasion and domination over the region.
					
					 The U.S. is wholly to blame for the military tensions escalating in East Asia and for the acts that compelled the DPRK to have access to nuclear deterrent in view of historical facts.
					
					 The U.S. has kept its forces in south Korea and Japan ever since the end of World War II. It knocked into shape military alliances for aggression and has ceaselessly beefed up armed forces and staged war exercises, posing military threats to countries in East Asia and increasing tensions there to an extreme pitch.
					
					 There is no other military alliance than the U.S.-led one in the East Asian region and there are no military threats except the ones posed by the U.S. and its military alliance in the region.
					
					 Had the U.S. not kept its troops in the region for military aggression and domination nor pursued unreasonable Cold War-oriented policy, the tensions in the region would have not run as high as now and the DPRK would not have had access to nuclear weapons.
					
					 The U.S. anachronistic Cold War-oriented policy remains unchanged even in the new century, turning the Korean Peninsula into the most unstable region in the world.
					
					 The U.S. is the chief culprit escalating military threats and tensions to East Asia.
					
					 It is preposterous for the U.S. to talk about "threats" from someone though it threw the East Asian region into confusion after making its way to it as an uninvited guest. 
					
					 The basic orientation of the foreign policy of the U.S. is to strengthen its domination over the region in the 21st century which it is advertising as the century of Asia-Pacific. 
					
					 The new U.S. administration has professed "changes" but nothing has changed in its foreign policy for domination, in fact. 
					
					 The hue and cry over "concern" and "threats" raised by the assistant secretary of Defense this time is aimed to shift the responsibility for disturbing peace and stability of East Asia on to others and invariably maintain and expand the military domination over the region behind the scene.
					
					 It is clearly proved by his assertion of the "need" to forward deploy the U.S. troops in the region including Okinawa and establish MD and keep nuclear forces there.
					
					 All developments go to prove that the U.S. has become all the more undisguised in its moves to carry out its Asia-Pacific strategy for aggression with south Korea and Japan, military strongholds, as bases under the signboard of "changes".
					
					 It is quite logical and right option prompted by the prevailing grave situation for the DPRK to steadily bolster up the war deterrent including nuclear weapons for self-defence.

articles.title: Settlement of Issue of Support for Korean Schools Called for
articles.content:
Settlement of Issue of Support for Korean Schools Called for
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- A meeting of parents of students of Tokyo Korean Senior Middle School was held at the Korean Hall of Culture in Tokyo on May 9 to vow to stage actions for the settlement of the issue of support for Korean schools. 
					 It was addressed by Sin Kil Ung, principal of the said school, Kim Tong Hak, secretary-general of the Korean Human Rights Association in Japan, and others.
					
					 The speakers held that the action taken by the Japanese authorities to exclude Korean schools from the list of support for the senior middle schools is part of their suppression and policy of discrimination against the Korean residents in Japan which have been persistently pursued over the past decades. 
					
					 Noting that it is an important task facing the parents of Korean students and other Korean children to protect the Korean schools and develop the national education, they called upon the parents to single-mindedly unite to seek a solution to the above-said issue. 
					
					 A letter of request to the prime minister and the minister of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology of Japan was adopted at the meeting. 
					
					 A video related to the issue was shown prior to the meeting.

articles.title: Mexican Figure Hails Kim Kim Jong Il's China Visit
articles.content:
Mexican Figure Hails Kim Kim Jong Il's China Visit
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- Cuautemoc Amezcua Dromundo, chairman of the Central Committee of the Socialist Popular Party of Mexico, issued a statement on May 11 in congratulation of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's successful unofficial visit to the People's Republic of China. 
					 The statement noted that his visit to China was a great event which would shine long in the history of the DPRK-China friendship.
					
					 The party and state leaders of China warmly welcomed Kim Jong Il and accorded warm hospitality to him, the statement noted, adding that this was a clear expression of high respect and reverence for him, an elder statesman of the world.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 His visit to China is a historic event that made an epochal contribution to defending peace and security in Northeast Asia including the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the world, strengthening the unity and cooperation among the progressive peoples in their efforts for independence and encouraging the human cause of independence.
					
					All the party members of the Socialist Popular Party of Mexico sincerely wish Kim Jong Il leading the drive of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people to open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012 greater success in his noble work, the statement stressed.

articles.title: Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Work Held in Switzerland
articles.content:
Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Work Held in Switzerland
Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- A seminar on General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction" took place in Switzerland on May 12 to mark the 46th anniversary of the start of his work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Charly Kalbfuss, chief of the Pyongyang Cultural Interchange Centre in Lausane, Switzerland, and other speakers noted that Kim Jong Il in the work says that preserving the Juche character and national character and ensuring the independent development of the country and the nation are an essential requirement for strengthening the international unity and solidarity and making a genuine contribution to the development of the global revolutionary movement. 
					
					 His work indicates a correct goal for the country and the people aspiring after independence and ways to attain it, they noted. 
					
					 They stressed that he has firmly adhered to the Juche-oriented stand in all fields of socialist construction including the party and the state building and solved the problems arising in revolution and construction independently and creatively in the interests of the Korean revolution and the Korean people.

articles.title: Story of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Story of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- One day in April Juche 82 (1993), President Kim Il Sung provided field guidance to a tideland-turned cooperative farm on the west coast.
					 After explaining some issues arising in cultivating young rice-plants, he moved to a harrowed rice field to see a machine transplanting rice seedlings.
					
					 Examining the rice-transplanting carefully, he asked an official of the farm when the field was harrowed. The official answered that it was harrowed one day ago.
					
					 The President told him that in order to transplant rice seedlings properly, harrow should be done 7-10 days before rice transplanting as they set out rice-plants with the help of machines.
					
					 He then said that rice seedlings would not be planted well if fields were not harrowed in advance.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige las labores del distrito de Samjiyon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige las labores del distrito de Samjiyon
Pyongyang, 18 de mayo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno las gestiones de varios sectores del distrito de Samjiyon.
					Ante todo, recorrio la estatua de bronce del Presidente Kim Il Sung, enclavada a la orilla del lago Samji, el Conjunto Monumental de Samjiyon y otros lugares averiguando en detalles la administracion de los escenarios de batalla revolucionaria y el estado de educacion con ellos.
					
					Senalo que la zona de Samjiyon es un lugar sagrado de la revolucion en que estan concentrados los vestigios de actividades revolucionarias del Presidente en la epoca de lucha armada antijaponesa e importante centro para la educacion en las tradiciones revolucionarias.
					
					Prosiguio que acondicionar bien esos campos de batalla es una sagrada labor para mantener y continuar firmemente las tradiciones revolucionarias, tesoro eterno de la revolucion.
					
					Nuestro partido tiene la firme voluntad y decision de llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche defendiendo y continuando para siempre las grandiosas tradiciones revolucionarias creadas por el Presidente en la epoca de larga lucha armada antijaponesa y basandose en ellas, apunto y agrego que las brillantes tradiciones revolucionarias del PTC sirven de fuente principal de la gran fuerza espiritual del indoblegable pueblo coreano.
					
					Presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia para mejorar el cuidado y la administracion de los lugares de batalla e intensificar la labor de educacion a traves de ellos.
					
					Acto seguido, el Dirigente estuvo en la Fabrica de Salsa y Pasta de Soya de Samjiyon construida nuevamente.
					
					Esta fabrica edificada originalmente al pie del pico Pegae significa otro regalo a los habitantes del distrito y a los integrantes de los grupos de recorrido de parte del Dirigente quien se preocupa siempre por suministrar mayor cantidad de alimentos sabrosos y nutritivos al pueblo coreano.
					
					Luego de escuchar la explicacion ante el plano de la fabrica, paso revista a la sala de presentacion del historial y varios procesos de produccion informandose en detalles del estado de construccion, produccion y equipos tecnicos.
					
					Se mostro muy satisfecho de que se haya construido esta magnifica fabrica para el pueblo, al contemplar los talleres donde se ha garantizado en el alto nivel el ambiente higienico-cultural y los alimentos basicos de buena calidad incluyendo la pasta y salsa de soya y el aceite que salen en cadena de las maquinas.
					
					Evaluo altamente los meritos de los constructores que hicieron otro favor para el pueblo destacando que esta fabrica situada en un buen lugar es rentable porque produce alimentos sabrosos y nutritivos en una area pequena de produccion con poca mano de obra basandose en la ciencia y tecnologia de punta.
					
					Por ultimo, presento las tareas que se presentan en la administracion de la fabrica.
					
					En esta ocasion le acompanaron el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Ryanggang, Kim Hi Thaek, el secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui y Jang Song Thaek, los primeros subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Ju Kyu Chang y Ri Je Gang, y los jefes de departamento del CDN de la RPDC, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno granja de patatas en construccion
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno granja de patatas en construccion
Pyongyang, 18 de mayo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional (CDN) de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la  granja de patatas de gran envergadura que se construye en la zona de Tokpho del distrito de Paek-am.
					 Tras escuchar las explicaciones ante el plano para el plan perspectivo de la produccion de patatas del distrito de Paek-am, recorrio la granja de patatas en construccion enterandose del estado del trabajo.
					
					 Esta nueva granja de patatas tiene suma importancia en convertir el distrito de Paek-am en la base productiva de patatas, dijo y presento las tareas programaticas que se presentan en la construccion de la granja.
					
					 En los ultimos anos fue logrado un cambio trascendental en el cultivo de patatas en el distrito de Taehongdan y otras zonas montanosas, subrayo y agrego que esta realidad orgullosa prueba patentemente la justeza e inagotable vitalidad de la orientacion del PTC en materia de hacer la innovacion en el cultivo de patatas.
					
					 Lo mas importante antes que nada en la construccion de la granja de patatas es anteponer la edificacion de carreteras basandose en el plan perspectivo, enseno.
					
					 Apunto que las experiencias del distrito de Taehongdan demuestran que a fin de lograr el rendimiento seguro, es preciso crear bien los bosques de proteccion contra viento y agrego que hay que plantar muchos arboles altos en las cabezas de las parcelas para detener el viento de las tierras altas.
					
					 Destaco que deben mecanizar todas las faenas agricolas desde la siembra hasta la desyerba, el abonamiento y la cosecha y enseno que hay que suministrar suficientemente los medios mecanicos necesarios a ese particular.
					
					 Indico que a fin de elevar incesantemente el rendimiento de patatas es preciso materializar estrictamente la orientacion de optimizacion de semillas del partido y desarrollar en gran medida la ganaderia para elevar la fertilidad de la tierra, y establecer el sistema de riego.
					
					 Conforme al incremento rapido de la produccion de patatas es preciso tomar las medidas activas de su almacenamiento y su elaboracion para usar de manera eficiente las patatas producidas, menciono.
					
					Subrayo que el distrito debe tomar de antemano las medidas para disponer de las instalaciones de almacenamiento y elaboracion de patatas.
					
					 A medida que se construye la granja de gran tamano se presenta ante el distrito la enorme tarea de construir muchos objetos incluyendo las viviendas, las escuelas, los jardines de infancia y los hospitales, dijo y asevero que para cumplirla con exito, los funcionarios y trabajadores, unidos, deben impulsar de manera audaz y magnanima todas las labores, con el metodo de la batalla relampago y de operacion aniquiladora.
					
					 El Dirigente expreso la gran esperanza y conviccion de que los pobladores del distrito se levantaran como un solo hombre en la labor para convertir cuanto antes el territorio de Paek-am en la gran base productiva de patatas del pais y se pondran al frente de la construccion del campo rural socialista y la produccion agricola.
					
					 En esta ocasion el fue acompanado por el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Ryanggang, Kim Hi Thaek, el secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui y Jang Song Thaek, los primeros subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Ju Kyu Chang y Ri Je Gang, y los jefes de departamento del CDN de la RPDC, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su.

articles.title: Convocatoria de la APS de la RPDC
articles.content:
Convocatoria de la APS de la RPDC
Pyongyang, 18 de mayo (ATCC) -- El Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema (APS) de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea promulgo el dia 17 la resolucion sobre la convocatoria de este organo legislativo
					Segun el documento, se convocara el 7 de junio en esta capital el tercer periodo de sesiones de la duodecima legislatura de la APS.

articles.title: Acto de ciudad de Pyongyang por levantamiento popular de Kwangju
articles.content:
Acto de ciudad de Pyongyang por levantamiento popular de Kwangju
Pyongyang, 18 de mayo (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 17 en la Casa Central de Obreros el acto de la ciudad de Pyongyang por el 30o aniversario del Levantamiento Popular de Kwangju en el Sur de Corea.
					En el acto participaron el vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Yang Hyong Sop, el presidente del Comite Central del Partido Social-Democrata de Corea, Kim Yong Dae, la presidenta del CC del Partido Chondoista Chong-u, Ryu Mi Yong, el miembro de la presidencia del CC del Frente Democratico para la Reunificacion de la Patria, Jo Chung Han, el director del Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria, An Kyong Ho, los funcionarios directivos de las organizaciones sociales, los rectores de las universidades, los funcionarios, trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes en la capital.
					
					El levantamiento popular de Kwangju fue una justa resistencia democratica antiyanqui y antifascista de los habitantes surcoreanos que se habian levantado en la lucha contra la dominacion fascista colonial de los imperialistas yanquis y sus lacayos y por la independencia y la democratizacion de la sociedad y por la reunificacion del pais y fue una sublevacion armada masiva que todos los ciudadanos de Kwangju libraron a muerte contra los yanquis y la camarilla fascista militar titere.
					
					Yang Hyong Sop, en su informe, senalo que aunque el levantamiento popular fue fracasado debido a la brutal represion sangrienta de los yanquis y la camarilla fascista, estremecio desde la raiz el cimiento de la dominacion fascista colonial en el Sur de Corea, manifesto sin reservas la indoblegable voluntad y el espiritu heroico de los habitantes surcoreanos tendentes a lograr la independencia y la democracia de la sociedad y la reunificacion de la patria y estimulo energicamente la lucha por la liberacion nacional de los pueblos oprimidos en colonia.
					
					Subrayo que a traves de tal levantamiento, los surcoreanos dejaron la leccion de sangre de que el imperialismo yanqui es el monstruoso agresor y asesino que perpetra sin vacilacion tambien la atrocidad sangrienta a fin de su proposito dominante e intereses y de que no es posible lograr cualquier anhelo de ellos mismos sin poner fin a la ocupacion militar y la dominacion colonial del imperialismo yanqui.
					
					Este ano es el significativo del 10o aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y del 30o aniversario de la presentacion del Proyecto de la Fundacion de la Republica Federal Democratica de Coryo, senalo y destaco que todos los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar deben frustrar con valentia todas las maquinaciones de estorbo de las fuerzas internas y externas anti-reunificacion y acelerar activamente la gran marcha nacional por la reunificacion bajo la bandera de la Declaracion Conjunta.

articles.title: ATCC comenta palabras del asistente del secretario de defensa de EE.UU.
articles.content:
ATCC comenta palabras del asistente del secretario de defensa de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 18 de mayo (ATCC) -- Hace poco, el asistente del secretario estadounidense de Defensa para Asia-Pacifico expreso su "preocupacion" por el desarrollo nuclear de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y el fortalecimiento del poderio militar de China y predico que son necesarios la presencia perenne de sus tropas en la region de Asia Oriental y el establecimiento del sistema antimisiles en ella. 
					Este sofisma persigue tergiversar la causa fundamental de la agravacion de la tension militar en esa area y seguir manteniendo la estrategia de agresion militar y dominio sobre la misma. 
					
					Desde el punto de vista historico, EE.UU. es el responsable principal de la agravacion de la tension militar en el area y de la posesion y mantenimiento del disuasivo nuclear por parte de la RPDC. 
					
					Despues de la Segunda Guerra Mundial, EE.UU. desplego sus tropas en el Sur de Corea y en Japon y vino creando hasta la fecha alianzas militares de caracter agresivo y recurriendo incesantemente al aumento armamentista y a los ejercicios belicos.
					
					Como resultado, los paises regionales viven bajo la amenaza militar y llego al extremo la tensa situacion regional. 
					
					En Asia Oriental no hay otra alianza militar excepto a las formadas por EE.UU. y solo existe la amenaza militar proveniente de este imperio y sus bloques militares. 
					
					Si EE.UU. no hubiera desplegado sus efectivos en esta region con el fin de realizar la agresion militar y dominacion ni perseguido la injusta politica de guerra fria, la situacion regional no se habria agravado tanto como ahora y la RPDC tampoco habria procurado su disuasivo nuclear. 
					
					La anacronica politica de guerra fria de EE.UU. sigue vigente en el nuevo siglo tambien, debido a lo cual la Peninsula Coreana devino la zona mas inestable del mundo. 
					
					Resulta muy absurdo que EE.UU., intruso que inquieta la region de Asia Oriental, hablara tanto de la "amenaza" de alguien. 
					
					En el XXI, siglo de Asia-Pacifico, EE.UU. enfoca su politica exterior en consolidar su dominio sobre la region.
					
					Aunque la actual administracion estadounidense profesa algun "cambio", no hubo ningun cambio en su politica exterior de caracter dominacionista. 
					
					Detras de los dichos del asistente del secretario estadounidense de Defensa como la "preocupacion" y la "amenaza" subyace el malsano objetivo de imputar a otros la responsabilidad de la perturbacion de la paz y la estabilidad de Asia Oriental y de mantener invariablemente y ampliar su esfera de dominio militar en la region.  
					
					Lo comprueban los alegatos utilizados por el para justificar la "necesidad" de emplazar sus tropas en los puestos avanzados de la region incluso Okinawa, establecer el sistema antimisiles y mantener las fuerzas nucleares. 
					
					Todos los hechos muestran que se tornan mas siniestras bajo el rotulo de "cambio" las maniobras de EE.UU. tendentes a realizar la estrategia sobre Asia-Pacifico con fines agresivos utilizando como su base el Sur de Corea y Japon, importantes puntos militares. 
					
					La RPDC fortalece constantemente el disuasivo de guerra, incluso las fuerzas nucleares para la autodefensa. Esto es la opcion razonable y mil veces justa que parte de la dura realidad de hoy.
